QuestData.Title: I'm With Scorpid
QuestData.Description: You gotta help me, you just gotta! Chelsea and I came out here to make a bit of money, just sell some supplies, legit work. Next thing I know she's on her deathbed! She's got a fever that'd shock a blacksmith, and she's hallucinating...$B$BShe must've been stung by the scorpids near here! I've seen it happen, it's not pretty. I gotta get some poison glands to make an antidote but I can't leave her side!$B$BPlease, help me! Get me those glands!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 Duneclaw Stingers from Duneclaw Scorpids.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have them? Oh, please...
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you, thank you! I know a bit of alchemy, I'm not totally useless. Here goes...
